about_the_game:
Falling into the depths of the ancient tomb alone, the influx of all kinds of Soul Seekers blocked every way out. Weapons? Supplies? So what? How long can you hold on? How many monsters can you kill?



He is the most awesome person in the whole stronghold. He is an old hunter with excellent shooting skills. He is Wang Shengli, the grandfather of Gu jiuxun and Gu Jiuyue.



In order to rescue Gu Jiuyue, he took the lead in rushing into the tomb. When blocking the influx of Soul Seekers for Gu jiuxun, he accidentally touched the mechanism and fell into the depths of the ancient tomb. Under serious injury, bursts of piercing cold gradually approached.
Facing all kinds of monsters swarming in, the only thing he can rely on is his beloved weapon - "Sarah Jean". Only fighting can live!



Fight alone and never give up!
